imgAlt: Quick start guide for creating a React Table in minutes
title: Quick Start
content: Create your first React Table and learn the basics in just a few minutes.

imgAlt: Beginner tutorial for building a React Table with key functionality
title: Beginner Tutorial
content: Learn key concepts by building a React Table with common functionality & customisations.

imgAlt: Learn how to customise a React Table with unique CSS themes
title: Custom Styles
content: Customise your React Table with the Theming API to create a unique theme for your brand.

imgAlt: Create and style Integrated Charts from your React Table
title: Integrated Charts
content: Build & style charts programatically, or let users create their own from the table.
